data.speaker: Player
data.content: This man's body is riddled with marks of the disease that afflicted Lev...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: With the scalpel I have, I should be able to extract its liver and make a cure.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Just remember your training, steady hand, continuous cut down the body...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: ... wait what training? Either way, here goes nothing...
